title: Crow and Pool
medium: graphite and watercolor on paper mounted on cardboard
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY. Dr. Henry Lyle; Alan Temple, Scarsdale, NY; Kraushaar Galleries, New York; NY by 1948 [1]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1948 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. See "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 75.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
